      • isFilterCommendsValid

        protected static int isFilterCommendsValid(java.lang.String[] commendOfFilter,
                                           int minLength,
                                           int maxLength)
                                    throws ErrorTypeOne
        a semi-check if the string commendline is valid, it checks a more general valid format length - at the beginning and NOT at the end
        Parameters:
        commendOfFilter - an array of strings ,each cell in array has info. about type, and action of this filter
        minLength - min length of the array of strings
        maxLength - max length of the array of strings
        Returns:
        int 0/1 it there is or not NOT commend at the end
        Throws:
        ErrorTypeOne - Exception dealing with bad line commend format from the commendfile

        public abstract boolean filter(java.io.File file)

        ErrorTypeOne
